verses.verse: Then he brought me back <WH7725> the way <WH1870> of the gate <WH8179> of the outward <WH2435> sanctuary <WH4720> which looketh <WH6437> toward the east <WH6921>; and it was shut <WH5462>.

Then said <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> unto me; This gate <WH8179> shall be shut <WH5462>, it shall not be opened <WH6605>, and no man <WH376> shall enter <WH935> in by it; because the LORD <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, hath entered <WH935> in by it, therefore it shall be shut <WH5462>.

It is for the prince <WH5387>; the prince <WH5387>, he shall sit <WH3427> in it to eat <WH398> bread <WH3899> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068>; he shall enter <WH935> by the way <WH1870> of the porch <WH197> of that gate <WH8179>, and shall go out <WH3318> by the way <WH1870> of the same.

¶ Then brought <WH935> he me the way <WH1870> of the north <WH6828> gate <WH8179> before <WH6440> the house <WH1004>: and I looked <WH7200>, and, behold, the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> filled <WH4390> the house <WH1004> of the LORD <WH3068>: and I fell <WH5307> upon my face <WH6440>.

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto me, Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, mark <WH7760> well <WH3820>, and behold <WH7200> with thine eyes <WH5869>, and hear <WH8085> with thine ears <WH241> all that I say <WH1696> unto thee concerning all the ordinances <WH2708> of the house <WH1004> of the LORD <WH3068>, and all the laws <WH8451> thereof; and mark <WH7760> well <WH3820> the entering in <WH3996> of the house <WH1004>, with every going forth <WH4161> of the sanctuary <WH4720>.

And thou shalt say <WH559> to the rebellious <WH4805>, even to the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; O ye house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, let it suffice <WH7227> you of all your abominations <WH8441>,

In that ye have brought <WH935> into my sanctuary strangers <WH1121> <WH5236>, uncircumcised <WH6189> in heart <WH3820>, and uncircumcised <WH6189> in flesh <WH1320>, to be in my sanctuary <WH4720>, to pollute <WH2490> it, even my house <WH1004>, when ye offer <WH7126> my bread <WH3899>, the fat <WH2459> and the blood <WH1818>, and they have broken <WH6565> my covenant <WH1285> because <WH413> of all your abominations <WH8441>.
And ye have not kept <WH8104> the charge <WH4931> of mine holy things <WH6944>: but ye have set <WH7760> keepers <WH8104> of my charge <WH4931> in my sanctuary <WH4720> for yourselves.

¶ Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; No stranger <WH1121> <WH5236>, uncircumcised <WH6189> in heart <WH3820>, nor uncircumcised <WH6189> in flesh <WH1320>, shall enter <WH935> into my sanctuary <WH4720>, of any stranger that is among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

And the Levites <WH3881> that are gone away far <WH7368> from me, when Israel <WH3478> went astray <WH8582>, which went astray away <WH8582> from me after <WH310> their idols <WH1544>; they shall even bear <WH5375> their iniquity <WH5771>.

Yet they shall be ministers <WH8334> in my sanctuary <WH4720>, having charge <WH6486> at the gates <WH8179> of the house <WH1004>, and ministering <WH8334> to the house <WH1004>: they shall slay <WH7819> the burnt offering <WH5930> and the sacrifice <WH2077> for the people <WH5971>, and they shall stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> them to minister <WH8334> unto them.

Because they ministered <WH8334> unto them before <WH6440> their idols <WH1544>, and caused the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> to fall <WH4383> into iniquity <WH5771>; therefore have I lifted up <WH5375> mine hand <WH3027> against them, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, and they shall bear <WH5375> their iniquity <WH5771>.

And they shall not come near <WH5066> unto me, to do the office of a priest <WH3547> unto me, nor to come near <WH5066> to any of my holy things <WH6944>, in the most holy <WH6944> place: but they shall bear <WH5375> their shame <WH3639>, and their abominations <WH8441> which they have committed <WH6213>.
But I will make <WH5414> them keepers <WH8104> of the charge <WH4931> of the house <WH1004>, for all the service <WH5656> thereof, and for all that shall be done <WH6213> therein.

¶ But the priests <WH3548> the Levites <WH3881>, the sons <WH1121> of Zadok <WH6659>, that kept <WH8104> the charge <WH4931> of my sanctuary <WH4720> when the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> went astray <WH8582> from me, they shall come near <WH7126> to me to minister <WH8334> unto me, and they shall stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> me to offer <WH7126> unto me the fat <WH2459> and the blood <WH1818>, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>:
They shall enter <WH935> into my sanctuary <WH4720>, and they shall come near <WH7126> to my table <WH7979>, to minister <WH8334> unto me, and they shall keep <WH8104> my charge <WH4931>.

¶ And it shall come to pass, that when they enter <WH935> in at the gates <WH8179> of the inner <WH6442> court <WH2691>, they shall be clothed <WH3847> with linen <WH6593> garments <WH899>; and no wool <WH6785> shall come <WH5927> upon them, whiles they minister <WH8334> in the gates <WH8179> of the inner <WH6442> court <WH2691>, and within <WH1004>.

They shall have linen <WH6593> bonnets <WH6287> upon their heads <WH7218>, and shall have linen <WH6593> breeches <WH4370> upon their loins <WH4975>; they shall not gird <WH2296> themselves with any thing that causeth sweat <WH3154>.

And when they go forth <WH3318> into the utter <WH2435> court <WH2691>, even into the utter <WH2435> court <WH2691> to the people <WH5971>, they shall put off <WH6584> their garments <WH899> wherein they ministered <WH8334>, and lay <WH3240> them in the holy <WH6944> chambers <WH3957>, and they shall put <WH3847> on other <WH312> garments <WH899>; and they shall not sanctify <WH6942> the people <WH5971> with their garments <WH899>.
Neither shall they shave <WH1548> their heads <WH7218>, nor suffer their locks <WH6545> to grow long <WH7971>; they shall only <WH3697> poll <WH3697> their heads <WH7218>.
Neither shall any priest <WH3548> drink <WH8354> wine <WH3196>, when they enter <WH935> into the inner <WH6442> court <WH2691>.

Neither shall they take <WH3947> for their wives <WH802> a widow <WH490>, nor her that is put away <WH1644>: but they shall take <WH3947> maidens <WH1330> of the seed <WH2233> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, or a widow <WH490> that had a priest <WH3548> before.
And they shall teach <WH3384> my people <WH5971> the difference between the holy <WH6944> and profane <WH2455>, and cause them to discern <WH3045> between the unclean <WH2931> and the clean <WH2889>.

And in controversy <WH7379> they shall stand <WH5975> in judgment <WH8199>; and they shall judge <WH8199> it according to my judgments <WH4941>: and they shall keep <WH8104> my laws <WH8451> and my statutes <WH2708> in all mine assemblies <WH4150>; and they shall hallow <WH6942> my sabbaths <WH7676>.

And they shall come <WH935> at no dead <WH4191> person <WH120> to defile <WH2930> themselves: but for father <WH1>, or for mother <WH517>, or for son <WH1121>, or for daughter <WH1323>, for brother <WH251>, or for sister <WH269> that hath had no husband <WH376>, they may defile <WH2930> themselves.
And after <WH310> he is cleansed <WH2893>, they shall reckon <WH5608> unto him seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>.

And in the day <WH3117> that he goeth <WH935> into the sanctuary <WH6944>, unto the inner <WH6442> court <WH2691>, to minister <WH8334> in the sanctuary <WH6944>, he shall offer <WH7126> his sin offering <WH2403>, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
And it shall be unto them for an inheritance <WH5159>: I am their inheritance <WH5159>: and ye shall give <WH5414> them no possession <WH272> in Israel <WH3478>: I am their possession <WH272>.
They shall eat <WH398> the meat offering <WH4503>, and the sin offering <WH2403>, and the trespass offering <WH817>; and every dedicated thing <WH2764> in Israel <WH3478> shall be theirs.

And the first <WH7225> of all the firstfruits <WH1061> of all things, and every oblation <WH8641> of all, of every sort of your oblations <WH8641>, shall be the priest's <WH3548>: ye shall also give <WH5414> unto the priest <WH3548> the first <WH7225> of your dough <WH6182>, that he may cause the blessing <WH1293> to rest <WH5117> in thine house <WH1004>.
The priests <WH3548> shall not eat <WH398> of any thing that is dead of itself <WH5038>, or torn <WH2966>, whether it be fowl <WH5775> or beast <WH929>.
